Based on the information provided by your colleagues, it seems that the code provided is correctly implementing the optimization problem to maximize the amount of paste produced using the small and large containers. 

Here are a few suggestions for improvement:
1. It would be beneficial to include comments within the code to explain the purpose of each section, such as defining decision variables, setting the objective function, adding constraints, and optimizing the model. This will make the code more readable and easier to understand for other developers.

2. Consider adding error handling mechanisms to the code to handle potential exceptions that may arise during the optimization process. This will help in ensuring the robustness of the code and provide a better user experience.

3. It might be helpful to include a print statement to display the optimal values of the decision variables (number of small and large containers used) along with the maximum amount of paste produced. This will provide more insights into the results of the optimization process.

Overall, the code structure and implementation seem to be in line with the optimization problem described. By incorporating the above suggestions, you can further enhance the code quality and readability.
